channel.title: How do you make somewere a safe zone plz?
channel.description:
Hey, this is the last thing i need help with..
Can someone please tell me how to make somewere a safe zone? Since the TuT has gone i havn't got a clue.
Reason: Peeps are pking at my portal room o.O
Tyvm <3 :confused:
